name: One Small Step (Team Jab)
description:
"One small step for man...
...one giant leap, for mankind."
- Neil Armstrong


Take giant leaps for Mankind as you hop from planet to planet, researching the geology along the way. Keep a close eye on your oxygen levels as this will deplete on non-atmospheric planets, forcing you to return to the Home planet before heading out again.

(This game was made in 72 hours for Jamfuser 2020, according to the theme 'Leap'.)

Credits:

- Josh Thomson (Animation & Rigging)

- Adam Cox (3d & UI Artist)

- Brad Dallimer (Programmer & Designer)
